Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory278.png'}
{3: 'Deep underground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Oh... How things have changed.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland sits at the bottom of a crater, watching the Red Tide pouring down from the broken pipes. Beside him lies the other ashen Hetero-Creature, now completely lifeless.'}
{3: 'He picks up his broken left arm, trying to match it up with where it fractures from his shoulder, before putting it down disappointingly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Sigh. The arm won't fit, and I can't climb up this shallow hole. The last time I was this messed up was when that Babylonian kid chased me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I suppose... I'm familiar with people lying at rock bottom, desperate and hopeless.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "But usually, I'd be the one standing up there looking down.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Can't say this hotheaded bravado suits me very well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Rarely do I trust someone else, so please don't let me down.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Bringing Luna to Gray Raven is just the first step... I really ought to figure out what to do next.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I hope she's realized what it is that she truly wants this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Now, before my next trick...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I'm just gonna... take a... nap...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Beneath the thunderous crashes of the Red Tide, Roland slowly closes his eye.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory281.png'}
{3: 'A crumpled piece of the Polyphage has formed a triangular-shaped cavity. All of a sudden, something moves the heavy, fragmented part away, revealing what is buried underneath.'}
{3: 'A human and a Construct, both heavily injured, lie on the ground, both trying to shield the other from harm.'}
{2: '???', 3: '...Hehe, you look miserable.'}
{3: 'The space before the unconscious Lucia warps and twists as if a pair of invisible hands are running over her body, making a rustling sound.'}
{3: 'Lucia frowns, her hand instinctively reaches for the hilt of her blade. Yet, her frame has long run out of power at this point, and she can no longer move.'}
{3: 'Something is being taken from her—a glistening white cube glows in the dark, before it vanishes into thin air.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Well, well, never say Lamia doesn't finish her job."}
{2: '???', 3: "... Hey, the whole place's going to fall on top of you guys if you don't wake up soon."}
{2: '???', 3: "Just so you know, I think it's way too much trouble to help you guys. I won't be doing this if someone isn't threatening me."}
{3: 'The comms terminal you carry suddenly emits the sound of a connection, and you slowly open your eyes amidst the falling rocks.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'A lightless night...'}
{3: 'Lucia recalls that she has also dragged her bruised body forward in the abyss in the past.'}
{3: 'To survive.'}
{3: 'To escape.'}
{3: 'To the home that awaits her.'}
{3: 'Why does she keep going on when everything is lost? Why will she not die?'}
{3: 'Perhaps because of a belief...'}
{3: 'The belief that, if she just takes one more step, she will reach the light that has once been described to her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory281.png'}
{3: "Lucia's last memory is the blinding white light she saw when Luna destroyed the Polyphage's Core."}
{3: '...What happened afterward?'}
{2: 'Are you awake?', 3: '52'}
{3: 'The mind of the woken Lucia is still in a state of confusion.'}
{3: 'But she quickly realizes that she is being carried.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant?! What are you doing? Let me down!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With the exoskeleton from the Support Force, you can just barely carry her and walk.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "But... you're also badly injured...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia looks back and finds the Polyphage buried by the collapsed cavern.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Luna—Commandant, where is Luna?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Did she escape? Or did she...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia turns around, but she cannot find the answer she is hoping for in the ruin of the colossal monster.'}
{3: 'But she seems to have noticed something and quiets down.'}
{3: 'Another violent quake occurs, and the stone cliff beneath your feet collapses, sending you into a fall.'}
{3: 'Lucia just catches your hand as she drops. Underneath the two of you lies the deadly Red Tide...'}
{3: 'A rope appears out of nowhere and lands right next to Lucia. She immediately holds onto it, saving both of you from a fatal fall.'}
{3: 'On a platform in the distance stands Bridget and the Support Force.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Surprise! It's a rope gun. You can always count on these antiques in a life-or-death situation.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Let me help—let's get them out quickly. This whole place is going to collapse any second...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia... Are you and Commandant alright?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia nods, before turning back and staring at the crumbling chasm.'}
{3: "But Luna's figure is nowhere to be seen, almost as if she has never been there."}
{3: 'Lucia does not look away, until the rocks in the underground cavern fully entomb the entire space, and conceal it from your visions...'}
